resources.string: Resource is not trashable by your app. Resources are only trashable if the authenticated user owns the resource and the resource is not app data.
There are no files or folders in the selected folder. Use the \"ADD FOLDER\" and \"ADD FILE\" buttons to add children to the currently selected folder.
Long press on any file or folder to change its trashed status. Note that if a folder is trashed all of its children are also trashed.

Unable to update DriveResource trash status. Note that if the resource is a folder the trash/untrash will only be successful if all children of the folder are accessible by this user and is not app data.
An unexpected error occurred while changing folders.
An unexpected error occurred while performing the operation.
